titleStmt.title: Religion and loyalty, the second part, or, The history of the concurrence of the imperial and ecclesiastical jurisdiction in the government of the church from the beginning of the reign of Jovian to the end of the reign of Justinian / by Samuel Parker ...
titleStmt.author: Parker, Samuel, 1640-1688.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Pages 526-586 from Huntington Library spliced at end.
Table of contents: p. [7]-[11] at front.
